companyFormation.title: Start Your EU Business
companyFormation.description: We help you register your company quickly and easily.

steps.step1: Choose the right legal structure (GmbH, UG, Ltd, etc.)
steps.step3: Submit the application to the business registry
steps.step4: Obtain a tax ID and open a business bank account
steps.step5: Start operations and stay compliant with local regulations

companyFormation.benefitsTitle: Why Start a Business in the EU?

benefits.benefit1: Access to a large EU market
benefits.benefit3: Lower corporate taxes in some EU countries
benefits.benefit4: Easier access to international banking and funding

documents.document2: Proof of address (utility bill, bank statement)
documents.document3: Company bylaws and articles of incorporation

companyFormation.ctaText: Ready to establish your business in the EU?

faq1.question: How do I update my company details?
faq1.answer: You can update your company details under the 'Company Formation' section.

faq2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq2.answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

faq3.question: How long does the registration process take?
faq3.answer: The process usually takes between 2 to 6 weeks, depending on the country.
